page.title: 02DOWMAC
page.content:
{Dowmac}are part of the{Norcross} organiation which has 2 more factories in NE England. Norcross erect concrete structures for large developments, including multi-storey car parks, offices and superstores. At the Dowmac site near{Quedgeley}pre-stressed re- inforced concrete units, weighing up to 30 tonnes, are manufactured. The workforce of approx. 120 produce an average of 3000 units per week. These units are mostly used by{British Rail. The raw materials used are: Sand from Worcestershire Aggregate from Titherington (Avon) Steel from Cardiff steelworks
The timekeeping and security at the entrance is the responsibility of one man. He believes one has to work harder today for a living.
